TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Overlapped extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供受管理的 Win32 OVERLAPPED 結構表示法，包括從 執行個體傳送資訊到 結構的方法。

span.span: Provides a managed representation of a Win32 OVERLAPPED structure, including methods to transfer information from an instance to a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法傳送的資訊物件結構可以傳遞至 Win32 API 函式的非同步檔案 I/O。The and methods transfer information from an object to a structure that can be passed to Win32 API functions for asynchronous file I/O. 方法傳輸的資訊從結構的執行個體類別。The method transfers information from a structure to an instance of the class. 變更屬性的物件會影響其相關聯結構，反之亦然。Changes to the properties of an object affect its associated structure, and vice versa.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新的空執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new, empty instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public Overlapped (int offsetLo, int offsetHi, int hEvent, IAsyncResult ar);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 offsetLo, int32 offsetHi, int32 hEvent, class System.IAsyncResult ar) cil managed
Public Sub New (offsetLo As Integer, offsetHi As Integer, hEvent As Integer, ar As IAsyncResult)
public: Overlapped(int offsetLo, int offsetHi, int hEvent, IAsyncResult ^ ar);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Not 64bit compatible. Please use the constructor that takes IntPtr for the event handle")

param.name: offsetLo
param.span: 要開始傳輸之檔案位置的低位文字。

span.span: The low word of the file position at which to start the transfer.

param.name: offsetHi
param.span: 要開始傳輸之檔案位置的高位文字。

span.span: The high word of the file position at which to start the transfer.

param.name: hEvent
param.span: 當 I/O 作業完成時收到信號的事件控制代碼。

span.span: The handle to an event that is signaled when the I/O operation is complete.

param.name: ar
param.span: 實作 介面並提供 I/O 作業狀態資訊的物件。

span.span: An object that implements the interface and provides status information on the I/O operation.

summary.span: 使用指定的檔案位置、當 I/O 作業完成時收到信號的事件控制代碼 (32 位元整數)，以及傳回作業結果所透過的介面，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified file position, the 32-bit integer handle to an event that is signaled when the I/O operation is complete, and an interface through which to return the results of the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來取得任何衍生自的受管理的同步處理事件的控制代碼類別。Use the property to get the handle of any managed synchronization event that derives from the class. 實作提供 I/O 作業的相關狀態資訊。Your implementation of provides status information on the I/O operation. 將它傳遞至建構函式中`ar`參數，並擷取它在稍後使用屬性。Pass it to the constructor in the `ar` parameter, and retrieve it later with the property. 如果指定的回呼方法或方法時，回呼可以擷取您所解壓縮收到的結構。If a callback method is specified for the or method, the callback can retrieve your by unpacking the structure it receives.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取得衍生自的受管理的同步處理物件的控制代碼類別，請使用屬性來取得物件，然後再呼叫方法。To get the handle of a managed synchronization object that derives from the class, use the property to get a object, and then call the method. 實作提供 I/O 作業的相關狀態資訊。Your implementation of provides status information on the I/O operation. 將它傳遞至建構函式中`ar`參數，並擷取它在稍後使用屬性。Pass it to the constructor in the `ar` parameter, and retrieve it later with the property. 如果指定的回呼方法或方法時，回呼可以擷取您所解壓縮收到的結構。If a callback method is specified for the or method, the callback can retrieve your by unpacking the structure it receives.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int EventHandle { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定當 I/O 作業完成時，收到信號之同步處理事件的控制代碼 (32 位元整數)。

span.span: Gets or sets the 32-bit integer handle to a synchronization event that is signaled when the I/O operation is complete.

value.span: 值，表示同步處理事件的控制代碼。

span.span: An value representing the handle of the synchronization event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不能在 64 位元平台上。This property cannot be used on 64-bit platforms. 請改用 屬性。Use the property instead. 使用屬性來取得任何衍生自的受管理的同步處理事件的控制代碼類別。Use the property to get the handle of any managed synchronization event that derives from the class.

span.span: Gets or sets the handle to the synchronization event that is signaled when the I/O operation is complete.
An representing the handle of the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取得衍生自的受管理的同步處理物件的控制代碼類別，請使用屬性來取得物件，然後再呼叫方法。To get the handle of a managed synchronization object that derives from the class, use the property to get a object, and then call the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Free(valuetype System.Threading.NativeOverlapped* nativeOverlappedPtr) cil managed

param.name: nativeOverlappedPtr
param.span: 要釋放的 結構的指標。

span.span: A pointer to the structure to be freed.

summary.span: 釋放 Unmanaged 記憶體，而此記憶體與 方法所配置的原生重疊結構相關聯。

span.span: Frees the unmanaged memory associated with a native overlapped structure allocated by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須呼叫方法一次上的每個指標接收來自方法。You must call the method exactly once on every pointer you receive from the method. 如果在未呼叫方法，將會造成記憶體流失。If you don't call the method, you will leak memory. 如果您呼叫方法超過一次以上，記憶體將會損毀。If you call the method more than once, memory will be corrupted.

span.span: is .

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

span.span: The file position is a byte offset from the start of the file.

value.span: 值，表示檔案位置的高位文字。

span.span: An value representing the high word of the file position.

summary.span: 將目前的執行個體封裝到 結構。

span.span: Packs the current instance into a structure.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Threading.NativeOverlapped* Pack(class System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback iocb) cil managed

param.name: iocb
param.span: 委派，表示非同步的 I/O 作業完成時所要叫用的回呼方法。

span.span: An delegate that represents the callback method invoked when the asynchronous I/O operation completes.

summary.span: 將目前的執行個體封裝到 結構，指定非同步的 I/O 作業完成時所要叫用的委派。

span.span: Packs the current instance into a structure, specifying the delegate to be invoked when the asynchronous I/O operation is complete.
An unmanaged pointer to a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的 unmanaged 的指標可以傳遞給重疊的 I/O 作業中的作業系統。The unmanaged pointer returned by this method can be passed to the operating system in overlapped I/O operations. 結構固定的實體記憶體中，直到在呼叫。The structure is fixed in physical memory until is called. > [!IMPORTANT] > 呼叫端會負責釘選緩衝區。The caller is responsible for pinning the buffer. 如果應用程式定義域已卸載，不過，已釘選緩衝區的控制代碼會終結，而且會釋放緩衝區，讓要釋放的位址寫入 I/O 作業。If the application domain is unloaded, however, the handle to the pinned buffer is destroyed and the buffer is released, leaving the I/O operation to write to the freed address. 基於這個理由，最好使用方法多載中，執行階段釘選緩衝區。For this reason, it is better to use the method overload, in which the runtime pins the buffer.

span.span: The current has already been packed.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.NativeOverlapped* Pack (System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback iocb, object userData);
.method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Threading.NativeOverlapped* Pack(class System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback iocb, object userData) cil managed

param.name: iocb
param.span: 委派，表示非同步的 I/O 作業完成時所要叫用的回呼方法。

span.span: An delegate that represents the callback method invoked when the asynchronous I/O operation completes.

param.name: userData
param.span: 物件或物件陣列，表示作業的輸入或輸出緩衝區。

span.span: An object or array of objects representing the input or output buffer for the operation.

param.span: 每個物件代表一個緩衝區，例如位元組陣列。

span.span: Each object represents a buffer, for example an array of bytes.

summary.span: 將目前的執行個體封裝到 結構，指定非同步的 I/O 作業完成時所叫用的委派，以及當做緩衝區的 Managed 物件。

span.span: Packs the current instance into a structure, specifying a delegate that is invoked when the asynchronous I/O operation is complete and a managed object that serves as a buffer.
An unmanaged pointer to a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的 unmanaged 的指標可以傳遞給重疊的 I/O 作業中的作業系統。The unmanaged pointer returned by this method can be passed to the operating system in overlapped I/O operations. 結構固定的實體記憶體中，直到在呼叫。The structure is fixed in physical memory until is called. 指定的緩衝區`userData`必須是相同傳遞至執行的非同步 I/O 的未受管理的作業系統函式。The buffer or buffers specified in `userData` must be the same as those passed to the unmanaged operating system function that performs the asynchronous I/O. > [!NOTE] > 執行階段釘選緩衝區或指定的緩衝區`userData`I/O 作業的持續期間。The runtime pins the buffer or buffers specified in `userData` for the duration of the I/O operation. 如果應用程式定義域卸載時，執行階段會保持固定，直到 I/O 作業完成的記憶體。If the application domain is unloaded, the runtime keeps the memory pinned until the I/O operation completes.

span.span: The current has already been packed.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Overlapped Unpack(valuetype System.Threading.NativeOverlapped* nativeOverlappedPtr) cil managed

span.span: An unmanaged pointer to a structure.

summary.span: 將指定 Unmanaged 結構解除封裝到 Managed 物件。

span.span: Unpacks the specified unmanaged structure into a managed object.

returns.span: 物件，包含從原生結構解除封裝的資訊。

span.span: An object containing the information unpacked from the native structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構不會釋放實體記憶體直到您呼叫方法。The structure is not freed from physical memory until you call the method.

span.span: is .

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

summary.span: 將目前的執行個體封裝到 結構。

span.span: Packs the current instance into a structure.

summary.span: 不會散佈呼叫堆疊。

span.span: Does not propagate the calling stack.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Threading.NativeOverlapped* UnsafePack(class System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback iocb) cil managed

param.name: iocb
param.span: 委派，表示非同步的 I/O 作業完成時所要叫用的回呼方法。

span.span: An delegate that represents the callback method invoked when the asynchronous I/O operation completes.

span.span: Packs the current instance into a structure specifying the delegate to invoke when the asynchronous I/O operation is complete.

summary.span: 不會散佈呼叫堆疊。

span.span: Does not propagate the calling stack.
An unmanaged pointer to a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的 unmanaged 的指標可以傳遞給重疊的 I/O 作業中的作業系統。The unmanaged pointer returned by this method can be passed to the operating system in overlapped I/O operations. 結構固定的實體記憶體中，直到在呼叫。The structure is fixed in physical memory until is called. 呼叫端會負責釘選緩衝區。The caller is responsible for pinning the buffer. 如果應用程式定義域已卸載，不過，已釘選緩衝區的控制代碼會終結，而且會釋放緩衝區，讓要釋放的位址寫入 I/O 作業。If the application domain is unloaded, however, the handle to the pinned buffer is destroyed and the buffer is released, leaving the I/O operation to write to the freed address. 基於這個理由，最好使用方法多載中，執行階段釘選緩衝區。For this reason, it is better to use the method overload, in which the runtime pins the buffer. > [!CAUTION] > 使用方法可能不小心開啟安全性漏洞。Using the method could inadvertently open up a security hole. 程式碼存取安全性會根據堆疊中的所有呼叫端的權限的權限檢查。Code access security bases its permission checks on the permissions of all the callers on the stack. 方法不會傳播呼叫堆疊。The method does not propagate the calling stack. 惡意程式碼可能可以利用此選項可避免權限檢查。Malicious code might be able to exploit this to avoid permission checks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的 unmanaged 的指標可以傳遞給重疊的 I/O 作業中的作業系統。The unmanaged pointer returned by this method can be passed to the operating system in overlapped I/O operations. 結構固定的實體記憶體中，直到在呼叫。The structure is fixed in physical memory until is called. 指定的緩衝區`userData`必須是相同傳遞至執行的非同步 I/O 的未受管理的作業系統函式。The buffer or buffers specified in `userData` must be the same as those passed to the unmanaged operating system function that performs the asynchronous I/O. 執行階段釘選緩衝區或指定的緩衝區`userData`I/O 作業的持續期間。The runtime pins the buffer or buffers specified in`userData` for the duration of the I/O operation. 如果應用程式定義域卸載時，執行階段會保持固定，直到 I/O 作業完成的記憶體。If the application domain is unloaded, the runtime keeps the memory pinned until the I/O operation completes. > [!CAUTION] > 使用方法可能不小心開啟安全性漏洞。Using the method could inadvertently open up a security hole. 程式碼存取安全性會根據堆疊中的所有呼叫端的權限的權限檢查。Code access security bases its permission checks on the permissions of all the callers on the stack. 方法不會傳播呼叫堆疊。The method does not propagate the calling stack. 惡意程式碼可能可以利用此選項可避免權限檢查。Malicious code might be able to exploit this to avoid permission checks.
